name: Runaway Corruption
description:
Story
In runaway corruption you play as the last survivor of a group of mages. The land is corrupted and the corruption has destroyed everything. You are trapped in a field with corruption all around. From the corruption ghouls emerge and attack you. Even if you can fend off the ghouls, the corruption is toxic and will harm you if you get too close. 

Mechanics

Ghouls emerge from the corrupted tiles. The more tiles you have, the more ghouls will come out--making the game significantly harder.

There are temporary upgrades for the mage's abilities. As well as hearts to replenish his health.
